name: InFAILtration
description:
My submission for 2019 GMTK Game Jam.

Short and silly game about an agent infiltrating office building and taking down terrorists. Since the agent is blind, he has to rely on information from 4 communication specialists, each with his own camera and set of info, but our agent can use ONLY ONE piece of that information at a time. So you'll either know where you are, where enemies are, where hostages are located or the layout of the office floor.

!! May be a little laggy in web :( !!

Controls:

[1], [2], [3] and [4] to change camera view.

Mouse to aim and left mouse button [LMB] to shoot.

That's it, have fun ;)

Framework: Godot 3.1

Text editor/IDE: Vim

Art Tool: Aseprite

Audio tool: Audacity

Sounds: Freesound.org

Music: Bensound.com
